Question
========

Which of the following actions lowers the probability of making a Type I error?

  
Answerlist
----------
* Lower the significance level from 0.05 to 0.01.
* Increasing the significance level from 0.01 to 0.05.
* Selecting a smaller sample.
* Selecting a larger sample.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
